post.author: Brendan
post.content:
Do you know anyone (including you, if appropriate) who would like to do this.
Location Don Mills (toronto)

Regards

Chris Sherret
Sherret Inc.
Marketing / Consulting
chris@sherret.com
www.sherret.com
(416) 423-0798
(866) 640-0808 (fax)

ROLE: Senior J2EE Developer

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:

* Provide fast and quality production support to customers by closely working with the BAs and customers to analyze and resolve issues through data and/or code fixes.
* Design and implement new product feature enhancements and provide recommendations on best approaches.
* Work with a team of developers and/or independently as needed to execute tasks within the allotted timeframe and deliver quality solutions. Provide guidance to junior staff as required.
* Conduct thorough unit testing and assist the BAs with functional, system and interface testing.
* Analyze business requirements and provide accurate technical work estimates.
* Perform other duties as required.

TECHNICAL QUALIFICATIONS:

Must Have
* Strong communication skills (both verbal and written)
* 7-10 years of experience in the design, development and deployment of n-tier enterprise applications using industry standard J2EE, utilizing technologies such as Servlets, MVC, JSP using Struts framework, Hibernate, EJB, and JDBC.
* Proficient in HTML, Javascript, XML and XSLT.
* Proficient in SQL.
* Excellent analytical, debugging and problem solving skills.
* Excellent team player with strong interpersonal skills.
* Ability to design, develop and test new enhancements using various J2EE technologies.
* Experience with Weblogic 6.1 and/or 8.1.

Nice to Have
* Familiarity with Unix, MQ Series, and LDAP.
* Working knowledge of oracle 8i/9i, and PL/SQL
* Visual Basic 6, VB.Net, COM, DCOM, ActiveX, Excel and Word VBA, and MS SQL Server.
EDUCATION:
* University Degree or College Diploma
post.title: Senior J2EE Developer, Toronto, PERM
